dict.acceptation: （贝、卵、坚果等的）壳；外壳；炮弹；（人的）表面性格；

sent.orig: Lost your shell connection? Need multiple shell sessions?
sent.trans: shell连接意外断开，需要多shell会话？

sent.orig: With shell show a local directory, but also shows current path!
sent.trans: 用shell方式显示本地目录，还可显示当前路径！

sent.orig: Shell Com realization of right paper menu, support the election!
sent.trans: Shell+Com实现文件的右键菜单，支持多选！

sent.orig: The book is comprehensive, concise language fluency, Shell programming for members to study and reference.
sent.trans: 本书内容全面、文字简洁流畅，适合Shell编程人员学习、参考。

sent.orig: CGI is like C or shell script languages.
